DOC.brief_summary: To conduct baseline survey cardiovascular , respiratory , major systemic disease risk factor member Vietnam Era Twin Registry .
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : The Vietnam Veteran Twin Registry , maintain NAS-NRC , create funding Veterans Administration . Department Defense record search subject bear 1939-1957 last name date birth . Follow-up induction record determine subject twin . The registry supplement old World War II Veterans Twin Registry support National Heart , Lung , Blood Institute . The new registry provide opportunity create resource Black Hispanic twin well white . The new registry also include data great educational , socioeconomic , lifestyle diversity available World War II Veterans Twin Registry . DESIGN NARRATIVE : During first year mail questionnaire design provided baseline data family history , body size , morbidity , psychosocial characteristic , smoking , alcohol consumption , diet , physical activity , drug use . The baseline data use analysis cardiovascular , pulmonary , blood disease , follow-up . From original survey , Veterans Administration provide magnetic tape data zygosity , smoking , alcohol consumption , heart , lung , blood disease , discharge rank , education , occupation , family income . The questionnaire complete almost 8,900 individual include 3,000 twin pair . The study completion date list record obtain `` Completed Date '' enter Query View Report System ( QVR ) .
